title: Online Election
input: A time interval with a vote [time,vote]. Each time there will be a person with the most popular vote. Given a series of time queries, return the most popular voted person at that timestamp.
output: The most popular person at that timestamp
solution: Build a sorted array of time and store with each element the most voted person at that time. Then do a binary search per timestamp to get the most voted person.
runtime: O(N) to build the array, O(logN) to query each timestamp
